content.text: Let me trigger a test by asking you a question.

questions.question: This is a test of the idle_prompt hook. Please wait 30+ seconds before responding to test the notification, or respond immediately to test the cancellation. Which would you like to test?

options.label: Wait for notification
options.description: Don't respond for 30+ seconds to trigger the notification

options.label: Cancel immediately
options.description: Respond now to test that the timer gets cancelled
